answers.answer: I failed mine. I have to prick my finger 4 times aday. I cant have sugar. It really is a pain!They said as long as i stick to the diet the baby wont come ouf bigger. I know some moms that also had it & the had a 7lb baby.  Dont worry. (:

question: Always something.. first i got the call that i ran the risk of a ds baby (ill love him no matter what) in love w him alrdy <3Now i get the call i failed my hr diabetes test and need to retest for 3 hrs and more loads of blood work.Im not as healthy as i thought feel so down.This time they tell me to fast. When i was allowed to eat the first time and didnt eat since the night before. I can only fail 1 out of the 4 blood drawns now. If i fail more i need a specialist. If im considered diabetic what should i be eating? Would i give birth earlier? I would be having a bigger sized baby? just worried :'( want baby rocco to be ok.Any moms w stories.. thanks.
title: failed glucose :(
